fields.name: dataset
fields.title: Dataset
fields.description: Selected Dataset

nodes.name: PrintNRows
nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame

fields.name: n
fields.title: Num Rows to Print
fields.description: number of rows to be printed

nodes.name: ColumnFilter
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame that contains only the selected columns

fields.name: outputCols
fields.title: Columns
fields.description: Columns to be included in the output DataFrame

nodes.name: Scala
nodes.description: This node runs any given Scala code. The input dataframe is passed in the variable inDF. The output dataframe is passed back by registering it as a temporary table.

fields.name: code
fields.title: Scala
fields.description: Scala code to be run. Input dataframe is in "inDF". Output/Result dataframe should be registered as a temporary table - df.registerTempTable("outDF")

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: VectorAssembler
nodes.description: Merges multiple columns into a vector column

fields.name: inputCols
fields.title: Input Columns
fields.description: Input column of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: outputCol
fields.title: Output Column
fields.description: Output column name

fields.name: featuresCol
fields.title: Features Column
fields.description: Features column of type vectorUDT for model fitting

fields.name: labelCol
fields.title: Label Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: predictionCol
fields.title: Prediction Columns
fields.description: The prediction column created during model scoring

fields.name: fitIntercept
fields.title: Fit Intercept
fields.description: Whether to fit an intercept term

fields.name: maxIter
fields.title: Maximum Iterations
fields.description: Maximum number of iterations (>= 0)

fields.name: regParam
fields.title: Regularization Param
fields.description: The regularization parameter

fields.name: elasticNetParam
fields.title: ElasticNet Param
fields.description: The ElasticNet mixing parameter. For alpha = 0, the penalty is an L2 penalty. For alpha = 1, it is an L1 penalty

fields.name: solver
fields.title: Solver
fields.description: The solver algorithm for optimization

fields.name: standardization
fields.title: Standardization
fields.description: Whether to standardize the training features before fitting the model

fields.name: tol
fields.title: Tolerance
fields.description: The convergence tolerance for iterative algorithms

fields.name: weightCol
fields.title: Weight Column
fields.description: If the 'weight column' is not specified, all instances are treated equally with a weight 1.0

fields.name: regParamGrid
fields.title: Regularization Param Grid Search
fields.description: Regularization Parameters for Grid Search

fields.name: elasticNetGrid
fields.title: ElasticNet Param Grid Search
fields.description: ElasticNet Parameters for Grid Search

fields.name: maxIterGrid
fields.title: MaxIter Param Grid Search
fields.description: Maximum iteration Parameters for Grid Search

nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame
